description.plain:
Ramon Ibanga Jr., known professionally as !llmind, is a Filipino American producer and DJ from New Jersey. He is Grammy-nominated and multi-platinum music, producing for artists like Kanye West, J. Cole, Drake, 50 Cent, and more. He is also a founder of Roseville Music Group and Blapkits.

!llmind has released many projects over his career, most notably Human. with Brooklyn rapper Joell Ortiz in 2018, and 1176 with Oakland rapper Guapdad 4000 in 2021.

!llmind has released many projects over his career, most notably Human. with Brooklyn rapper Joell Ortiz in 2018, and 1176 with Oakland rapper Guapdad 4000 in 2021.
